issue.title: www.hulu.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.hulu.com/watch/a3dea9b5-6df3-47fb-84ac-a6a4e90a91d8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Fwatch%2Fa3dea9b5-6df3-47fb-84ac-a6a4e90a91d8) ### Comment > Trying to watch Hulu on Safari with the AdGuard for Safari extension active, however there are still ads popping up at the start of each new episode. I also notice the runtime for these episodes are longer and the ads are a part of the runtime. I have the AdGuard extension installed on Google Chrome as well with the same exact settings and Hulu works perfectly fine over there. Normal episode runtime and all ads are blocked without issues. ### Screenshots

issue.title: https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Ublock Origin Lite

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js

### Ad Blocking

EasyList, AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

We have received a report (link to our bug report: https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-82567) that `fr ca Adguard Francais` is causing `https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js` to be blocked when dynamically loaded within [Atlassian Confluence Whiteboards](https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/whiteboards) which causes the app to not work correctly.

This problem seems to have emerged around 19 August and has been reported by several of our customers.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.threads.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.threads.com/?hl=zh-tw](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.threads.com%2F%3Fhl%3Dzh-tw) ### Comment > **網站 (Website):** > https://www.threads.net/ > > **問題描述 (Problem Description):** > 啟用 AdGuard 瀏覽器擴充功能後，Threads.net 網站會顯示為空白頁面，並陷入不斷重新整理的迴圈，導致任何內容都無法載入。 > > **重現步驟 (Steps to Reproduce):** > 1. 在乾淨的瀏覽器環境中安裝 AdGuard 擴充功能。 > 2. 啟用預設的過濾器清單 (例如：AdGuard 基礎過濾器、追蹤防護、中文過濾器等)。 > 3. 前往 https://www.threads.net/ > 4. 觀察到頁面呈現空白，且瀏覽器分頁圖示顯示正在持續重新載入。 > > **已進行的故障排除 (Troubleshooting Done):** > 確認問題僅在 AdGuard 啟用時發生，停用對該網站的防護後即可正常瀏覽。同時，已停用所有其他的廣告封鎖擴充功能，以確認問題來源為 AdGuard 的過濾規則。 ``` Username: @wu858430049 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/2iut5gphnpwk4c4cc4soo4wcsckcgwc6xrqsp1tovk.png?nc=1)

### Prerequisites

### What product do you use?

### AdGuard version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Desktop

### Privacy

### Other

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

We have received a report (link to our bug report: https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-82567) that `fr ca Adguard Francais` is causing `https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js` to be blocked when dynamically loaded within [Atlassian Confluence Whiteboards](https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/whiteboards) which causes the app to not work correctly.

This problem seems to have emerged around 19 August and has been reported by several of our customers.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
It looks like that it has been fixed in https://github.com/easylist/listefr/commit/4a1115a3dfa05a4efc7c1207e918a200dcccfb24 (`Liste FR - EasyList` is included to `AdGuard French filter`).
Related issue - https://github.com/easylist/listefr/issues/260

But in the case of MV3 extension, new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates, so it may takes few days until it will be updated.

comment.body:
I'm not so familiar with AdGuard Content Blocker for Android.
According to [documentation ](https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/#basic-rules-basic-modifiers) `$important` modifier is not supported by AdGuard Content Blocker for Android, so it's probably a reason why  `elemhide,important` exclusion is ignored.
There is also `@@||focus.de^$generichide` in German filter, so I'm not sure which rule has higher priority in case if `elemhide` is used without `important`.
I guess that for ad-reinjection is recommended to install AdGuard for Android.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.threads.com/?hl=zh-tw](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.threads.com%2F%3Fhl%3Dzh-tw) ### Comment > **網站 (Website):** > https://www.threads.net/ > > **問題描述 (Problem Description):** > 啟用 AdGuard 瀏覽器擴充功能後，Threads.net 網站會顯示為空白頁面，並陷入不斷重新整理的迴圈，導致任何內容都無法載入。 > > **重現步驟 (Steps to Reproduce):** > 1. 在乾淨的瀏覽器環境中安裝 AdGuard 擴充功能。 > 2. 啟用預設的過濾器清單 (例如：AdGuard 基礎過濾器、追蹤防護、中文過濾器等)。 > 3. 前往 https://www.threads.net/ > 4. 觀察到頁面呈現空白，且瀏覽器分頁圖示顯示正在持續重新載入。 > > **已進行的故障排除 (Troubleshooting Done):** > 確認問題僅在 AdGuard 啟用時發生，停用對該網站的防護後即可正常瀏覽。同時，已停用所有其他的廣告封鎖擴充功能，以確認問題來源為 AdGuard 的過濾規則。 ``` Username: @wu858430049 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/2iut5gphnpwk4c4cc4soo4wcsckcgwc6xrqsp1tovk.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Better Klaviyo tracking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Problem description

Klaviyo Javascript is being blocked due to the addition of this rule

```
||static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/telemetry
||static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/event_adapter
||a.klaviyo.com
```


### Proposed solution

The correct blocked script should be

```
||static-tracking.klaviyo.com/onsite/*
```
which blocks any analytics scripts/API requests/etc that Klaviyo uses for shopper identification.

We should _not_ be blocking requests to `a.klaviyo.com`. That rule should be removed.

### Additional information

A similar issue was submitted: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210120#issuecomment-3128250521

But the fix implemented was not the proposed solution.

comment.body: @owen-carpenter-klaviyo Ok, could you please provide an example of affected site, and what exactly must be checked?

comment.body:
I think that this rule should not be applied as `#$#` rules should not be available in filter list for Content Blocker.
But I see:
```adblock
focus.de,fool.de,it-production.com###top-banner
```
in `AdGuard German filter`, it's from `EasyList Germany`.
Maybe we should add `focus.de#@##top-banner` exception?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: YouTube video playback may be interrupted by a prompt
issue.body:
### Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue
- [x] I checked the [knowledge base](https://adguard.com/kb/) and found no answer
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### AdGuard Extension version

Version 5.1.102  TSWebExtension v3.1.0-alpha.3 TSUrlFilter v3.3.3 Scriptlets v2.1.6 ExtendedCss v2.1.1

### Browser version

Zen version: 1.14.11b (64-bit)

### OS version

Version Windows 11 Professional Workstation Version No. 24H2 26120.5761 Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.26100.234.0

### Ad Blocking

_No response_

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Tracking protection options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Issue Details

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the YouTube video.
2. Refresh the page
3. Display pop-up window

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

When you open a YouTube video, the video shows that the black screen cannot be loaded, after which the refresh can be displayed to display the preview screen and play the video, showing the interrupt pop-up window in the bottom left corner.

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1</summary>

</details>

_No response_

issue.title: Better Klaviyo tracking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Problem description

Klaviyo Javascript is being blocked due to the addition of this rule

```
||static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/telemetry
||static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/event_adapter
||a.klaviyo.com
```


### Proposed solution

The correct blocked script should be

```
||static-tracking.klaviyo.com/onsite/*
```
which blocks any analytics scripts/API requests/etc that Klaviyo uses for shopper identification.

We should _not_ be blocking requests to `a.klaviyo.com`. That rule should be removed.

### Additional information

A similar issue was submitted: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210120#issuecomment-3128250521

But the fix implemented was not the proposed solution.

comment.body:
> [@owen-carpenter-klaviyo](https://github.com/owen-carpenter-klaviyo) Ok, could you please provide an example of affected site, and what exactly must be checked?

You can go on any site that has klaviyo.js installed and verify that submitting form steps does not work while running this software. It _may_ work for steps that do not require any inputs, but any steps where a user would input email or phone number will no longer function.

Example sites with klaviyo.js installed:
- https://skims.com/
- https://mgemi.com/
- https://badsox.myshopify.com/

If you'd like to manually open a form (on repeat testing attempts) you can use the `klaviyo.openForm('<form_id>')` API available in the browser console.

comment.body:
Hi.
We use "trusted" rules here, uBO and AdGuard rejects such rules from third-party filters due to security purposes.

With regular rules uploading will be blocked, download - works.
```
wetransfer.com##.fides-consent-wall
wetransfer.com#$#.transfer__cookie-wall-active { opacity: inherit !important; }
```

These rules used to click the Reject button

```
pandotree.wetransfer.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '#fides-banner-container .fides-reject-all-button', '!cookie:fides_consent')
wetransfer.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.terms-conditions button.transfer__button')
wetransfer.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.fides-tcf-banner-container .fides-banner-button-group > button.fides-reject-all-button')
```

You may ask uBO's filter maintainers to add rules to their filter.
